tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    transaction_type TEXT,
    quantity INT,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    order_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(product_id)
);

CREATE TABLE products ( 
 id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
 name VARCHAR(255), 
 quantity INT, 
 price DECIMAL(10, 2), 
 date_added TIMESTAMP 
);

CREATE TABLE stock_levels ( 
 id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
 product_id INT, 
 location_id INT, 
 quantity INT, 
 last_updated TIMESTAMP 
);

CREATE TABLE transactions ( 
 transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
 product_id INT, 
 location_id INT, 
 transaction_type VARCHAR(255), 
 quantity_changed INT, 
 timestamp TIMESTAMP 
);

CREATE TABLE inventory_management_inventory (
   product_id INT,
   warehouse_id INT,
   quantity INT,
   PRIMARY KEY (product_id, warehouse_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES inventory_management_products(product_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (warehouse_id) REFERENCES inventory_management_warehouses(warehouse_id)
);

CREATE TABLE inventory_management_sales (
   sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   product_id INT,
   quantity_sold INT,
   sale_date TIMESTAMP,
   FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES inventory_management_products(product_id)
);
